title: RCS (Chat) not working on SIM 2 in a Pixel 4
content:
This happened on both my wife's and my Pixel 4 XL. We're with Telstra in Australia. 
I had RCS working on my physical SIM (showing in SIM 1) while I was waiting for my number to provisioned as an eSIM. When my physical SIM stopped working I set up the eSIM (still showing in SIM 2), but then RCS stopped working. Even after removing the dead physical SIM. And I can't figure out how to disable dual SIM mode completely. 

We did the reverse in my wife's phone (RCS working on the eSIM in the SIM 1 "slot"), but as soon as we put her work SIM in it shifted the eSIM to be SIM 2 and she lost RCS capability.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
